name: Kart heroes
description:
Get ready for the most insane action packed kart racing game ever!

Explore 4 different worlds with 15 level on each and every one of them,
Compete against other kart drivers and make your way to fame!

Collect coins to unlock new drivers, new powerups and weapons to use against the other drivers and slow them down in order to pass them by!

Shoot fireballs, blast your competetors with liquid ice and unlock mysterious traps in order to cheat your way to the finish line!

All kart heroes are insanely good drivers so you need to be better.
Bounce on trampolines, find the mysterious powerups and speed bosters,
use every way you can just to pass the other ones to goal.

Get ready for the most ultimate and awesome kart racing game ever made especially for you guys who love
arcade racing games and tons of action and mindblowing fun!

No ads and No in app purchases,
This is just a one time small cost to pay for the game and in return you will get lifetime full of awesome gaming with free updates.

Get ready, download Kart heroes today!
